Bash(go with a black leather bag dude. thats damn near and all white outfit"

FIX: Broader definition of "light outfit"
- Added light blue, denim, pastels to light outfit detection
- Light outfit now includes:
  * White, cream, beige, ivory, off-white
  * Light blue, baby blue, sky blue, powder blue
  * Denim (light denim, blue denim)
  * Pastels, pale colors, soft colors
  * Tan, nude, sand

Result: light blue tank + denim shorts + white sneakers is now correctly
identified as a light outfit â†’ avoids black bag, picks tan/denim/brown instead

Both backend and AI now understand that denim + light blue + white sneakers
is basically an all-light look that needs a softer bag color.
